get.summary: ListAchievements queries all achievements for a player

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

limit.description:

If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

reverse.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

retrochain.arcade.v1.ArcadeGame.title: ArcadeGame represents a registered arcade game

retrochain.arcade.v1.GameGenre.title: GameGenre represents different arcade game genres

retrochain.arcade.v1.GameSession.title: GameSession represents an active gaming session

retrochain.arcade.v1.HighScore.title: HighScore represents a high score record

retrochain.arcade.v1.LeaderboardEntry.title: LeaderboardEntry represents a global leaderboard entry

base_credits_cost.title: Base credits cost per game (in uretro)

high_score_reward.title: High score reward in arcade tokens

retrochain.arcade.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetGameRespons.description: QueryGetGameResponse is response type for the Query/GetGame RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetHighScoresR.description: QueryGetHighScoresResponse is response type for the Query/GetHighScores RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetLeaderboard.description: QueryGetLeaderboardResponse is response type for the Query/GetLeaderboard RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetPlayerCredi.description: QueryGetPlayerCreditsResponse is response type for the Query/GetPlayerCredits RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetPlayerStats.description: QueryGetPlayerStatsResponse is response type for the Query/GetPlayerStats RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetSessionResp.description: QueryGetSessionResponse is response type for the Query/GetSession RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetTournamentR.description: QueryGetTournamentResponse is response type for the Query/GetTournament RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryListAchievemen.description: QueryListAchievementsResponse is response type for the Query/ListAchievements RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryListGamesRespo.description: QueryListGamesResponse is response type for the Query/ListGames RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryListPlayerSess.description: QueryListPlayerSessionsResponse is response type for the Query/ListPlayerSessions RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryListTournament.description: QueryListTournamentsResponse is response type for the Query/ListTournaments RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.SessionStatus.title: SessionStatus represents the current status of a game session
